abstract: Bank of America, under pressure to keep distressed borrowers from losing their homes, said Wednesday that it would begin forgiving some of their mortgage debt.
snippet: Bank of America, under pressure to keep distressed borrowers from losing their homes, said Wednesday that it would begin forgiving some of their mortgage debt.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America, under pressure to keep distressed borrowers from losing their homes, said on Wednesday that it would begin forgiving some mortgage debt, The New York Times’s David Streitfeld and Louise Story report.

headline.main: Bank of America to Reduce Mortgage Balances
